text: 19:12-13 Hibru 12:18-20Egh nɨ mɨghsɨam bagh mɨtaghniam atɨgh. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba mɨtaghniar kamɨn vongɨn mangan markɨ. Nɨ deraghvɨra me mɨkɨm, me deraghvɨra ganigh, me mɨtaghniar kamɨn ikiavkɨnigh vongɨn mangɨ, mɨghsɨamɨn mavanangan kogham. Guizbangɨra me mɨghsɨamɨn boroghɨra mangan kɨ anogoroke. Gumazitam mɨtaghniamɨn ikiavkɨnightɨ, me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham.
